short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to see what their grade would be depending on their score.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are using progressbook, the website doesn't allow you to see what your grade would be for hypothetical future assignments.  This extension enables this to happen with a simple extension.
